imageURL.description: This field specifies the URL for the ad image, serving as a visual representation to capture viewers' attention.

variants.description: Specifies the required image fixed size. See https://www.iab.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/IABNewAdPortfolio_LW_FixedSizeSpec.pdf for IAB's standard ad sizes.
Specifies the required image ratio to maintain consistent appearance across platforms.
Limits the image source to IPFS or HTTPS protocols for secure and reliable delivery.
Constrains the image to specific formats for optimized loading times and device compatibility.

linkURL.description: Defines the destination URL to direct users upon ad interaction, facilitating engagement and conversion.

xCreatorHandle.description: Identifies the X (Twitter) handle of the promoted individual or entity, enhancing their online presence.

xSpaceId.description: Indicates the unique ID for a promoted X (Twitter) Space, connecting users to live discussions.

DynamicBanner.description: Features a banner that showcases an image and URL submitted by an NFT owner. A random minted NFT's associated image and URL are displayed per request. Checkout banner is displayed if there is no validated ad.

ClickableLogosGrid.description: Displays a grid of logos. Each logo can link to a URL. NFT owners can submit their logo and URL for a cell. Checkout logos and URLs are shown for non-minted or unvalidated entries.

LogosGrid.description: Displays a grid of logos. NFT owners can submit their logo for a cell. Nothing is displayed for non-minted or unvalidated entries.

xCreatorHighlight.description: Promotes a User by displaying the X (Twitter) handle and image. Users are redirected to the profile page by clicking the banner. A checkout link to buy ad space is shown if there's no validated ad.

names.fr: Promotion d'un Space provenant de X (Twitter)

xSpaceHighlight.description: Promotes a Space by displaying the X (Twitter) handle of the host and the Space title. Users can join the Space by clicking the banner. A checkout link to buy ad space is shown if there's no validated ad.

fromContext.description: Displays the ad contextually relevant to the user. Token id(s) can be determined by the user's search query, for example.

variationInputs.description: Specifies the token ID(s) to use for contextual ad display.

print.description: Non interactive or printed materials, such as PDF, posters, or magazines.

React Native.description: Mobile applications built using React Native.

web.description: Web-based platforms, including websites and web applications.
